AdditionalFields.Value: Bioinformatics / Computational Biology / Systems Biology / Convergent Science,Tumor Biology,Cancer Evolution

Description: Big data analysis has become a powerful approach for cancer discovery and precision oncology. Here, we present new insights gained from big data analyses on a) mutational processes contributing to cancer initiation and progression in tens of thousands of patients; b) clonal evolution patterns mapped from mouse models to patient samples; c) modelling of therapy-related clonal hematopoiesis in thousands of long-term survivors of pediatric cancer and d) innovative computational methods for predicting patient response using transcriptomic, imaging and clinical trial data.
PrimaryCategory: Bioinformatics / Computational Biology / Systems Biology / Convergent Science
SearchResultBody: SY28. New Insights into Cancer Initiation, Evolution, Therapy, and Survivorship through Big Data Analysis
Title: New Insights into Cancer Initiation, Evolution, Therapy, and Survivorship through Big Data Analysis
